subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Houston Rockets point guard Jeremy Lin became the first Crimson player to reach the N.B.A.’s postseason in 65 years, since Saul Mariaschin in 1948.
snippet: Houston Rockets point guard Jeremy Lin became the first Crimson player to reach the N.B.A.’s postseason in 65 years, since Saul Mariaschin in 1948.
